message: Uh guys... Bernie Sanders is an independent, and therefore will not receive any nomination.

Dear Leftists, Liberals, and Progressives, You lost this election because you got up every day and loudly accused anyone who didn't agree with you of being a racist, misogynist, bigot, homophobic You lost because you did nothing but spew hate for 8 years while telling us yours was an ideology of love. You lost because you stole from America via taxation while telling us that we were the greedy ones. You lost because you dropped more bombs, killed more with drone strikes, and increased tensions with a nuclear superpower all while telling us that we were the war-mongers. You lost because the cities that you controlled spiraled into poverty and crime all while you told us that our policies disenfranchised people. You lost because you told us that gender is simply a social construct all while telling us that Hillary should be president because of her gender. You lost because you support and take money from regimes that imprison or kill gays, subjugate women, and think that rape is a man's right all while telling us that we hate gays, are afraid of women, and promote a culture of rape. You did not lose because we are racist. You did not lose because we are homophobic. You did not lose because we are misogynists or bigots. You lost because you are liars. You lost because you are hypocrites. You lost because you were not witty or clever enough to even hide those facts very well. Sincerely, The Rest of American News
Mike Lavigne & Bambu Prince Deon

Actually, if you look at his record he hasn't done a thing for Blacks since he got into office. In fact he even cancelled several programs to help young black men get out of the system and find good jobs like Gary Job Corps college training that he cancelled in 2011. Blacks have less opportunities now than they had prior to 2008. The government training and the jobs for minorities have disappeared under Obama. Things have gotten worse than they have been in decades for Black families in the last 8 yrs and some black leaders are finally waking up.

, historically to present, the majority of scientists do not agree with the concept of man-made Carbon Dioxide emissions significantly affecting climate - which at present is called Global Climate Change. As governments saw an ability to harness funds and a third party evil to unite their citizenry around in order to better control that population, governments created positions to further understand how to use such a concept. Think it through. They did not hire individuals who did not agree with the end-goal of human control. They hired individuals who would agree with what their goals. Notice how all the big names left the government side of the industry in the 90's and early 00's? The A crowd. There is a reason. They were replaced with the C & D crowd who will hawk whatever they are told to hawk for a paycheck. That is not science. That is neither good governance nor good long-term policy creation. But it is a great way to usher in control to which most reasonable people would object under any other circumstance.
